short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to remove sponsored tweets from Twitter/X.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TwitterSponsorZap is an innovative browser extension designed to enhance your twitter/X experience by removing commercial collaborations and sponsored content from your web browsing. This user-friendly tool is tailored for individuals who prefer a clean, advertisement-free online environment.

Automatic Content Filtering: TwitterSponsorZap intelligently identifies and removes various forms of sponsored content, including commercial collaborations, sponsored posts, and advertisements, ensuring a more authentic browsing experience.

Multilingual Support: Equipped to recognize commercial content in multiple languages, including English, French, and Spanish, catering to a diverse user base.

User-Controlled Experience: With a simple ON/OFF toggle button, users can effortlessly activate or deactivate the extension as per their browsing needs.

Real-Time Updating: Utilizes MutationObserver to dynamically remove sponsored content in real-time, keeping your page clean even as new content loads.

Enhanced Browsing: Enjoy a focused and uninterrupted browsing experience without the clutter of commercial content.

Data Privacy : We do not collect your data or personal informations

Stay Updated: Regular updates to the extension ensure compatibility with the latest web standards and advertising techniques.

Getting started with AdZap is easy! Simply add the extension to your Chrome browser, and it will automatically start cleansing your web pages from unwanted commercial content. Customize your experience using the popup menu and stay in control of what you see online.

For any additional keywords or suggestions, feel free to reach out to @UncertainCoder on Twitter. Your feedback helps us improve and adapt to the ever-changing digital landscape.
